The '''Blessing of the Welkin Moon''' is a US$4.99 (€4.99) 30 day subscription offer in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. Upon buying the blessing, players will immediately obtain 300 [[Genesis Crystal]]s and will continue to receive 90 [[Primogem]]s every day they log in for the next 30 days. Failure to log in will result in a day being deducted from the Blessing without the player receiving any primogems.

It can be purchased multiple times to extend its duration as long as the current duration does not exceed 180 days (6 total purchases). It is not an auto renewing subscription, so it needs to be purchased manually once the duration has expired.

The {{Item|Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon}} item can be obtained from limited time [[Web Events]] to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards when used.

==Total Rewards==
Over a 30-day period this totals up to:
{{Card|Genesis Crystal|300|rarity=5|stars=1}}{{Card|Primogem|2,700|rarity=5|stars=1}}
